title: US elections 2025 live: Mamdani refuses to be ‘intimidated’ by Trump jibes as New York City, New Jersey, Virginia and California vote
summary: A New York mayoral candidate has responded after President Biden referred to Jewish voters supporting him as "stupid." The candidate condemned the remark, asserting that Jewish voters are entitled to their choices and highlighting the need for respect in political discourse. The exchange underscores tensions between political figures and voter communities.

title: Anxious Aston residents prepare for Villa’s match against Maccabi Tel Aviv
summary: Residents and business owners near Aston Villa's stadium are voicing concerns ahead of the club's Europa League match against Maccabi Tel Aviv. Their apprehensions likely stem from potential disruptions or safety issues associated with the large influx of fans. The club has yet to address these worries, leaving the community feeling unsettled.
